description: Dashboard for FRITZ!Box routers using Prometheus and fritz_exporter

targets.query: SELECT cumulative_sum(max("value")) FROM "fritzbox_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'totalbytesreceived') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("value"))) FROM "fritzbox_value" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'totalbytessent') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

title: Fritz!Exporter Dash
